description:
from Salesloft


**Query Parameters:**

- **ids**: the id's of actions

- **step_id**: The ID of the step to retrieve. If not provided, all steps for the pipeline will be returned.

- **type**: Filter actions by type. email, phone, integration etc.

- **due_on[gt]**: Returns all matching records that are greater than the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.

- **due_on[gte]**: Returns all matching records that are greater than or equal to the provided iso8601 timestamp. The date should be in iso8601 format.

- **due_on[lt]**: Returns all matching records that are less than the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.

- **due_on[lte]**: Returns all matching records that are less than or equal to the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.

- **user_guid**: Filters actions by the user's guid. Multiple user guids can be applied.

- **person_id**: retrieves the records by using person name.

- **cadence_id**: The cadence id of the action

- **multitouch_group_id**: The ID of the multitouch group to filter by. If not specified, all actions will be returned.

- **updated_at[gt]**: Returns all matching records that are greater than the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.

- **updated_at[gte]**: Returns all matching records that are greater than or equal to the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.

- **updated_at[lt]**: Returns all matching records that are less than the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.

- **updated_at[lte]**: Returns all matching records that are less than or equal to the provided iso8601 timestamp. The comparison is done using microsecond precision.

- **sort_by**: The field to sort by. Defaults to created_at.

- **sort_direction**: The direction to sort the results in. Can be either `asc` or `desc`.

- **per_page**: How many records to show per page in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 25

- **page**: The current page to fetch results from. Defaults to 1.

- **include_paging_counts**: Whether to include total_pages and total_count in the metadata. Defaults to false

- **limit_paging_counts**: Specifies whether the max limit of 10k records should be applied to pagination counts. Affects the total_count and total_pages data.


**Responses:**

- **200** (Success): sucess
  - Content-Type: `text/plain`

  - **Example:**
```json
"success"
```

type.title: Type
type.description: Filter actions by type. Can be one of:email, phone,integration and other

due_on[gt].title: Due on after the date
due_on[gt].description: Returns actions that are due on after the provided date

due_on[gte].title: Due on greater than or equal to date
due_on[gte].description: Returns actions that are greater than or equal to the provided date

due_on[lt].title: Due on before the date
due_on[lt].description: Returns actions that are due on before the provided date

due_on[lte].title: Due on less than or equal to date
due_on[lte].description: Returns actions that are less than or equal to the provided date

user_guid.title: User guid
user_guid.description: Filters actions by the user's guid

multitouch_group_id.title: Multitouch group id
multitouch_group_id.description: Filter actions by multitouch group id

updated_at[gt].title: Updated on after the date
updated_at[gt].description: Returns actions that are updated after the provided date

updated_at[gte].title: Updated at greater than or equal to the date
updated_at[gte].description: Returns actions that are greater than the provided date

updated_at[lt].title: Updated on before the date
updated_at[lt].description: Returns actions that are updated before the provided date

updated_at[lte].title: Updated at less than or equal to the date
updated_at[lte].description: Returns actions that are less than or equal to the provided date

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Key to sort on, must be one of: created_at, updated_at. Defaults to updated_at

sort_direction.title: Sort direction
sort_direction.description: Direction to sort in, must be one of: ASC, DESC. Defaults to DESC

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: How many records to show per page in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 25

page.title: Page
page.description: The current page to fetch results from. Defaults to 1.

include_paging_counts.title: Include paging counts
include_paging_counts.description: Whether to include total_pages and total_count in the metadata. Defaults to false

limit_paging_counts.title: Limit paging counts
limit_paging_counts.description: Specifies whether the max limit of 10k records should be applied to pagination counts. Affects the total_count and total_pages data.

name: salesloft-all-actions-getv2actions
